divs: Sighting DetailsIt was August or Early september 2012 a red orange ball of fire flew over me at work from south to north I could see it for about 3 or 4 minutes and it kept going in a straight line as far as I could see. It was traveling slower then a plane would and relatively low, there wre no clouds but if there were I would say it would have been under cloud cover in height. It looked almost like a mini sun would look as if you would see the sun from space, a ball of fire not like a meteorite but a distinct ball of fire and not moving at an angle but in a straight line. There was no trail like you would see a meteor have it was a orb of fire, I think there might have been a slight smoke trial but I dont remmember exactly that detail isn't clear as it was several months ago.
Summary: Red Orange ball of fire flew south to north in a straight line slowly and lower then a meterorite
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Queensbury
There were no other sightings in Queensbury on or around August 25th 2012
